Mana Barrier.name: Mana Barrier
Mana Barrier.blurb: When Blitzcrank's life is brought below 20% health, he activates Mana Barrier. This creates a mana shield equal to 30% of his mana for 10 seconds. Mana Barrier can only occur once every 90 seconds.
Mana Barrier.description: Innate: Periodically, when Blitzcrank receives damage that would bring him below  30% maximum health, he generates a  shield equal to  30% of his maximum mana that lasts for up to 10 seconds.
Mana Barrier.notes:
* The official tooltip notes 20% Health as the threshold of the effect, but it actually triggers at 30% Health.
 Mana Barrier's  cooldown starts as soon as it triggers.
 The shield only activates if he's lower than or equal to 30% of his maximum health. If he's above it, and the damage received would bring him below it, he will first take a part of the damage to reach 30% of his maximum health, and then trigger the shield to block the remaining part.
 Mana Barrier will trigger after  Nullifying Orb and  Phantom Dancer if Blitzcrank's health is above 30% health, and they will trigger simultaneously when Blitzcrank takes damage while below 30% health.
 Mana Barrier will trigger simultaneously with  Hexdrinker or  Maw of Malmortius if Blitzcrank's health is above 30% health, and trigger before them when Blitzcrank takes damage while below 30% health.

Rocket Grab.name: Rocket Grab
Rocket Grab.blurb: Blitzcrank fires his right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to him.
Rocket Grab.description: Active: Blitzcrank fires his right hand in the target direction, dealing  magic damage while  pulling the first enemy hit to him,  stunning them for 0.5 seconds.
Rocket Grab.description2: Blitzcrank becomes unable to move or attack while Rocket Grab is in flight.
Rocket Grab.notes:
* Rocket Grab has a 0.25 second  casting time.[2]
 Blitzcrank will attempt to basic attack the target once the target has been pulled to him. This will not grant a stack of  Electrocute,  Conqueror,  Phase Rush, or  Spellthief's Edge.
 Some  cleansing effects followed by a  blink or  dash can  interrupt the pull.
 Abilities with imminent casting times are not affected by Rocket Grab and will occur normally as if they had not been pulled.
 For skillshots, such as  Final Spark, they will fire from the point of cast regardless of the caster's position when the casting time ends. 
 For dashes and blinks such as  Arcane Shift the caster will update  to the target location after the casting time regardless of if they were displaced or not.

 If Blitzcrank himself moves by any means during the grab, the pulled target will also follow to his new location.
 This can occur by ally-targeted abilities and other such as  Fate's Call and  Dark Passage which both force the unit to move involuntarily. It also interacts with all types of knock back and knock away effects.

Overdrive.name: Overdrive
Overdrive.blurb: Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased Movement and Attack Speed. He is temporarily slowed after the effect ends.
Overdrive.description: Active: Blitzcrank puts himself into overdrive, gaining  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds and  bonus movement speed that decays to 10% after 2.5 seconds.
Overdrive.description2: When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank is  slowed by 30% for 1.5 seconds.
Overdrive.notes: * The self-slow is affected by Slow resist and  Tenacity.

Power Fist.name: Power Fist
Power Fist.blurb: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double damage and pop his target up in the air.
Power Fist.description: Active: Blitzcrank's next basic attack within 5 seconds deals 100% AD  bonus physical damage and  knocks up his target for 1 second.
Power Fist.description2: Power Fist resets Blitzcrank's basic attack timer.
Power Fist.notes:
*  Critical strikes will not interact with Power Fist's bonus damage.
 Power Fist is not interrupted by most effects that would normally prevent basic attacks from hitting their target.
 The  knockup is applied even if the attack is  dodged or if it  misses.
 The attack will complete even if the target becomes  untargetable during the windup.

Static Field.name: Static Field
Static Field.blurb: Passively causes lightning bolts to damage a nearby enemy. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to damage nearby enemies and silence them for 0.5 seconds, but doing so removes the passive lightning until Static Field becomes available again.
Static Field.description: Passive: While Static Field is available, Blitzcrank's basic attacks apply a mark that stacks up to 3 times. After every 1 second, 1 mark is consumed to deal magic damage.
Static Field.description2: Active: Blitzcrank detonates his static field, destroying damage-mitigating shields of nearby enemies before dealing magic damage and  silencing them for 0.5 seconds.
Static Field.notes: * The mark is  single target, while the detonation is area of effect.
